name: Config 2022 Name Badge - [Adam Ginsburg]
description: Husband, Father, Geek, Surfer and Founder of Buzzy. We want to make it easier to create products. We've created a pretty cool nocode plugin for Figma that creates BOTH responsive web apps and native iOS / Android apps NO CODE!!! Yep we generate the DB, all the code. Stoked to be here in the Figma Community
